Description: DescriptionHello, I have been selling with eBay from Japan so I can provide you the best service. You can enjoy playing music.★ This product is also available at other EC sites.We will update as soon as possible, but if this product is sold on another EC site before this is sold on eBay, we are very sorry, but we will cancel the transaction on this site.★ I have examined the item(s) and included my observations as accurate as I could in the description above. PaymentPlease pay within 3 days after the auction closed.ShippingWorldwide shipping from Tokyo. For goods with hard cases we usually pack hard case and contents by cushioning material (usually bubble wrap). There has never been a problem with that shipping method so far. However, if you want a hard case to be included in cardboard, I can ship by that method if you pay additional $10. This applies only to products that originally have hard case.this item is shipped within 1 business days after payment is confirmed.(Sunday and public holidays is not business day)It takes 4-7 days to be delivered with insurance and trucking number.*We can not use EMS(Japan Post) service for some countries in Central Asia (Kazakhstan, Kyrgystan, Tajikistan etc.) If your shipping address is in these areas, please contact us before bidding. ReturnsReturns are accepted ONLY if the item was not the item described.International Buyers - Please Note: * Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. Feedback: Feedback is very important for everyone participating in community. Please kindly leave feedback once you get the package, we will leave same for you. Thanks! If things happened please contact us before you leave feedback, we will offer you a satisfactory result. We are serious seller and will respond asap.
